products.name: Premium aaaa Wireless Headphones

products.name: Eco-Friendly Water Bottle
products.description: Sustainable stainless steel water bottle with double-wall insulation. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

products.name: Professional Camera Lens
products.description: High-performance 85mm f/1.4 lens for professional photography. Sharp images with beautiful bokeh and exceptional low-light performance.

products.description: Complete skincare routine with premium ingredients. Includes cleanser, serum, moisturizer, and SPF protection.

products.name: Artisan Chocolate Collection
products.description: Handcrafted chocolate collection featuring 12 unique flavors. Made with single-origin cacao and natural ingredients.

products.name: Wireless Charging Station
products.description: Multi-device wireless charging station for phones, earbuds, and smartwatches. Fast charging with LED indicators.

products.name: Smart Home Hub
products.description: Central control hub for all your smart home devices. Voice control, app integration, and seamless automation.
